about: Marinated Paneer cubes with spices and yogurt, grilled with onion and pepper and rolled into breadding and shallow fried.
Threaded mushrooms and peppers alternativel on skewers, brushed with flavourful oils, lemon juice, garlic, thyme, rosemary, salt, pepper and grilled.
Batter coated sweet corn, deep fried and srinkled with spices.
Freshly ground chicken, cheese adspices made into lemon sized balls and golden fried.
Bhetki fish fillets are cut in shape of fingers, marinated and deep fried.
Boneless chicken that are battered and deep fried, and dressed with translucent green, semi-thick sauce of mint and coriander.
A platter of sauted vegetables, topped with spicy tomato sauce, served with steamed rice.
Tofu with green peas mashed with boiled potatoes and onions, covered in bread crumbs and crisp fried
Mushroom, baby corn, beans, cooked in milky white sauce and cheese
Oyster sauce stewed chicken in a rich creamy sauce served along with herbed basil rice.
Bhetki fish fillet stuffed with cheese and veggies and roasted in green tomato salad served with Mexican rice.
